typeDescription.name: SelfAwareAnnotation
typeDescription.description:
Annotation subclass which is aware of the annotator that produced it.
Fields inherited from Annotation: begin, end

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the annotator that produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: Span
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of SelfAwareAnnotation. Annotates a span of text with a String that may encode information about the span of text.
Fields inherited from SelfAwareAnnotation: begin, end, annotator

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description:
The text annotated by the span.
**Note that this text may differ from the portion of the annotated TestElement as indexed between begin and end!!

typeDescription.name: TokenizedSpan
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of Span which annotates a tokenization for its span.
Fields inherited from Span: begin, end, annotator, text

featureDescription.name: tokens
featureDescription.description: The tokens identified in the tokenization of this Span.

typeDescription.name: Ngram
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of TokenizedSpan which annotates a subset of a tokenization corresponding to an ngram of finite length n.
Fields inherited from TokenizedSpan: begin, end, annotator, text, tokens

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: The cardinality of the ngram identified by this TokenizedSpan.

typeDescription.name: NgramSet
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of Span annotating selected ngrams for the given span.
Fields inherited from Span: begin, end, annotator, text

featureDescription.name: ngrams
featureDescription.description: Array of ngrams identified for this Span.

typeDescription.name: Answer
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of span annotating an answer choice for a particular TestElement. Is aware of whether it is a correct answer choice or not.
Fields inherited from Span: begin, end, annotator, text

featureDescription.name: correct
featureDescription.description: Indicates correctness of this Span as an answer choice under "gold" labels.

featureDescription.name: number
featureDescription.description: The integer answer number of this answer choice.

typeDescription.name: TokenAnnotation
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of SelfAwareAnnotation holding tokenization annotations for a TestElement.
Fields inherited from SelfAwareAnnotation: begin, end, annotator

featureDescription.name: questionTokens
featureDescription.description: Tokenization of the question for this TestElement.

featureDescription.name: answersTokens
featureDescription.description: Array holding a tokenization for each answer choice for this TestElement.

typeDescription.name: NgramAnnotation
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of SelfAwareAnnotation holding ngram annotations for a TestElement.
Fields inherited from SelfAwareAnnotation: begin, end, annotator

featureDescription.name: questionNgrams
featureDescription.description: The ngrams identified in the question for this TestElement.

featureDescription.name: answersNgrams
featureDescription.description: Array of ngrams identified in each answer choice for this TestElement.

typeDescription.name: AnswerScoringAnnotation
typeDescription.description:
Subclass of SelfAwareAnnotation holding answer scoring annotations for a TestElement.
Fields inherited from SelfAwareAnnotation: begin, end, annotator

featureDescription.name: scores
featureDescription.description: Array of scores assigned to each answer by the analysis engine.

typeDescription.name: TestElementAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A basic form for test element annotations. Contains the number of this test elements' question and the correctness array for this test element's answers.

featureDescription.name: question
featureDescription.description: The Span associated with the question for this annotation. Also contains the question number.

featureDescription.name: answers
featureDescription.description: Array holding annotations identifying each answer choice for this TestElement.

typeDescription.name: OutputAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A final annotation to hold the filename and contents of an output file.

featureDescription.name: filename
featureDescription.description: The file to which this output will be written.

featureDescription.name: text
featureDescription.description: The output to be written to the file.

typeDescription.name: Question
typeDescription.description: An annotation indicating a question. Holds the question number as well as the info for that question's Span.

featureDescription.name: qNumber
featureDescription.description: The number associated with the question for this annotation. Must be saved as a string to preserve "001" style format.
